text: Kwiinkamela ezimbini (inkunzi nemazi) neenkomo (inkunzi nemazi), Yithi: “Ingaba Akavumelanga iinkunzi ezi zombini na okanye iimazi ezi okanye (amathole) angaphakathi ezibelekweni zezi mazi zombini kusini na? Makube nanikhona na nina ngethuba uAllâh Eniyalela ukuba nenze loo nto?” Ngubani na owenza ubugwenxa ukugqitha kulowo uqamba ubuxoki ngoAllâh, ekhokelela abantu ekulahlekeni engenalwazi. Inene uAllâh Akabakhokeli abantu abangabagabadeli
